Package invader

Class MovingObject

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.image.ImageView
invader.MovingObject
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
Direct Known Subclasses:
Entity, PowerUp, Projectile
public abstract class MovingObject
extends javafx.scene.image.ImageView
Author:
Pierce Forte, Jeff Kim Abstract class that is used for all moving objects on the screen, including the enemy, boss, spaceship, lasers, missiles Has common methods like setting x, y speed, position, checking out of bounds, to reduce duplicate code in all the subclasses. It inherits the ImageView class, which is one of the design decision we made.
